data.title: Vlahovic Group CEO was a Guest on the "Good Morning, Croatia" Talk Show
data.text:
Zagreb, December 16, 2022 – Vlahovic Group CEO, Natko Vlahovic, was a guest of the “Good Morning, Croatia” talk show on Croatian Radio Television (HRT). He presented news about the drafting process of the first Lobbying Act, which the Government of the Republic of Croatia is currently working on, and which is expected to be adopted in 2023. He also shared his thoughts on the development of the lobbying profession in Croatia and what such legal regulation would mean for its further development. If you are interested in the Croatian advocacy industry, please watch the entire interview below.

Vlahovic Group sends a biweekly political update on the activities of the Croatian Government (schedules and notable news). The update includes a listing of the activities of the PM and other members of the Government, new appointments, a selection of press releases by different Governmental departments and executive agencies. By subscribing, you agree to recieve this newsletter. You can unsubscribe anytime. The collected data is used only for registration and sending the newsletter and will not be used for other purposes.
